title: More Anon: Selected Poems
description: Selected poems of Maureen N. McLaneMore Anon gathers a selection of poems from Maureen N. McLaneâ€™s critically acclaimed first five books of poetry.McLane, whose 2014 collection This Blue was a finalist for the National Book Award, is a poet of wit and play, of romanticism and intellect, of song and polemic. More Anon presents her work anew. The poems spark with life, and the concentrated selection showcases her energy and style.
author: Maureen N. McLane
